title: what lane is Qiyana
body: me and my friend are having a discussion about what lane Qiyana is. can someone tell me

replies.body:
I hope it's not mid, on the last six new characters three was on the mid. Two reworks can be added to this (akali and irelia)
I hope she is top or jungle
She can be played jg too, right?
Qiyana is meant to go mid. If you look at the abilities of a champ in the client. The preview shows the lane they're intended to go in. (In which lane her abilities have their preview.)

Riot has managed not to release a single jungle champion for 2 years now, with the last one being Kayn.
If this is not a jungle champion, or if she ends up like Sylas who "can" jungle, then this is just weird in my opinion..
Sylas and Pyke both jungle well.
She's pretty good jungle and can set up some good ganks, i'm thinkin jungle

I'm hoping jungle, while our jungle pool is alright. We haven't gotten a "new" jungle champ since kayn like spiritguy said, we've only lost champs. We got Taliyah for a little which was fun, we had camille for a while which again was fun, but it would be nice to get a "new" champ specifically targeted to the jungle.

My prediction is she will be played in the jungle, and if that's bad, will try mid, and if her range makes mid too difficult, she will end up in top lane like everything else that lacks a home but can destroy melees 1v1.

I don't think she will be jungle. She has zero sustain and her waveclear is pretty bad. She has good mobility and catching tools, but that just makes her a better midlaner, imo. She can grab the water element with her W and root people and engage as her jungler comes in for a gank. Perfect setup. 

Besides, Riot said openly that she's supposed to be a solo-lane assassin. Again, she has no sustain, so I don't think she'll be amazing top. I'm thinking mid.
They say she's supposed to be a solo lane ad assassin but I sure as heck hope she is better at jungle...
